There is, at #Dijon, like a perfume of the coming spring, which announces the victories of the month of May! # FH2012
What a pleasure to greet you, huge crowd here in #Dijon! # FH2012
Elected from all the assemblies of France, from the Republic, I want here in #Dijon, to pay tribute to you. # FH2012
You, elected, serve the general interest without expecting anything in return. You are living the spirit of decentralization. #Dijon # FH2012
Decentralization has given our country the breath of democracy. #Dijon # FH2012
Elected from the Republic, I am one of you. #Dijon # FH2012
I felt proud to be called Mayor. #Dijon # FH2012
I do not forget that with the five letters of "mayor", we write the word "love". #Dijon # FH2012
It's because I love France that I applied. It's because I refuse to see it damaged. #Dijon # FH2012
To love France is to serve it. #Dijon # FH2012
I came before you to deliver my conception of the presidency. #Dijon # FH2012
Omnipotence leads to impotence. #Dijon # FH2012
The first duty of the next President will be to be accountable. #Dijon # FH2012
Power always leads to excess if it does not impose itself limits. #Dijon # FH2012
I make the commitment here to end the excesses and to open a new tone, that of coherence, clarity. #Dijon # FH2012
The brutality hurts, the agitation tires. #Dijon # FH2012
The next President will be independent. #Dijon # FH2012
Independent of his own party: I will not be the leader of my party, but the head of state. #Dijon # FH2012
Independent of the powers of money: the new President must put them at a distance. #Dijon # FH2012
Being independent means being the guarantor of secularism, scrupulously respecting the neutrality of the state. #Dijon # FH2012
It is nowhere to be everywhere said Montaigne! #Dijon # FH2012
I have come to announce you a big news here in #Dijon: if I am elected President of the Republic..it will be a government! # FH2012
In a democracy we preside by dialogue, not by monologue! #Dijon # FH2012
An agenda will be set the day after the election with both social partners and local authorities. #Dijon # FH2012
The President who will straighten out France will not do it alone! #Dijon # FH2012
An impartial state is a State respectful of its administration. #Dijon # FH2012
I am not sure that these senior officials, these high judges, have been well treated in the last five years. #Dijon # FH2012
In the future, senior officials will be appointed on their competence. #Dijon # FH2012
The only loyalty that will be demanded of them will be towards the State and not with regard to the Head of State. #Dijon # FH2012
The President will respect the legislative power! #Dijon # FH2012
I know and measure the role of Parliament. #Dijon # FH2012
A deputy, a senator, does not represent a department, but an entire nation. #Dijon # FH2012
I will vote for the end of the cumulative parliamentary term with that of a local executive. Each mandate will be self-sufficient. #Dijon # FH2012
To respect the other powers is to respect the judicial authority. #Dijon # FH2012
Justice will belong to the French people on whose behalf it makes its decisions. #Dijon # FH2012
If we want there to always be this freedom of the press, we need an independent press. #Dijon # FH2012
The new President will recognize the lifeblood of the nation. They are called intermediate bodies. #Dijon # FH2012
I will work with these energy forces! #Dijon # FH2012
I ask them a little patience. We arrive! #Dijon # FH2012
I will put social democracy in the Constitution. #Dijon # FH2012
We do not reform the work against the workers the school against the teachers the companies against the entrepreneurs! #Dijon # FH2012
Recourse to the referendum can be justified: during a profound reform of the constitution and during a transfer of sovereignty. #Dijon
It is a statement of confidence that I have come today to pronounce. #Dijon # FH2012
I am announcing here a new act of decentralization. #Dijon # FH2012
For 5 years, the fiscal autonomy of local authorities has been reduced. #Dijon # FH2012
I recall that 80% of the public debt in France is the debt of the state. #Dijon # FH2012
I remind you that the deficit of the state is 67 times higher than that of the local authorities.
Decentralization will allow the reform of the state. It will be a factor of clarity. #Dijon # FH2012
It is together, State and local communities, that we will be able to live up to the expectations that are brought to us! #Dijon # FH2012
A high council of the territories will be created. #Dijon # FH2012
I will guarantee the level of state grants to local authorities, with one goal: justice! #Dijon # FH2012
What Neuilly-sur-Seine pays for Bobigny, it's called justice between the territories! #Dijon # FH2012
I want to give, also, a greater legibility to our territorial organization. #Dijon # FH2012
The state has nothing to fear from this evolution! #Dijon # FH2012
I announced the dependency reform that was so promised without ever being made! #Dijon # FH2012
The "territorial advisor" will be terminated. #Dijon # FH2012
36,000 communes is a chance, a human and administrative presence. #Dijon # FH2012
It will strengthen the intercommunality. #Dijon # FH2012
France has such a diversity of territories! Our duty is to live together, to share the same aspirations. #Dijon # FH2012
I want to be the President who will succeed the return of the Republic everywhere. #Dijon # FH2012
Spatial segregation has become the other name of social segregation. #Dijon # FH2012
No child of the Republic can believe himself outside the Republic. #Dijon # FH2012
The Republic will not let any child turn away from her. #Dijon # FH2012
Again, the key word is the equality of all! That's why I will launch this new stage of decentralization. #Dijon # FH2012
I proposed to include in our constitution the principles of the 1905 law! #Dijon # FH2012
The Republic against privileges, is made for equality! #Dijon # FH2012
I am proud, I am happy to live in France and to be aware that we all serve the homeland where we live! #Dijon # FH2012
I remember that in 1981, François Mitterrand was able to raise a real momentum. #Dijon # FH2012
I would like 30 years later, a similar movement to happen again. #Dijon # FH2012
I will have no other ambition than to serve my country in the name of my ideas. #Dijon # FH2012
I promise you respect. Respect for elected officials, citizens, social partners. #Dijon # FH2012
Words, which always have a meaning, must be mastered. #Dijon # FH2012
Let's live up to the expectations of the French and the stakes of the country. #Dijon # FH2012
I have courage, I have plenty! #Dijon # FH2012
In this race, I have only one goal: the victory of our values, but above all, the victory of France! #Dijon # FH2012
Greetings my dear Vice President Elias! What beauty that productive unit of flowers. Pa'lante with the Agrarian Revolution! We will live And we will come!
Find the full speech I gave today at #Dijon here: http://t.co/pZ10WrR2 # FH2012
How happy you all make me the flower producers of Miranda and all of Venezuela. Together, private producers and Government, we will fly better!
"Apure is always Apure" How much I love that land, that town, that History, that Pampa! Hugs Ramón and all the Apureños and Apureñas!
Epa Town of Táchira! That next Governor! Those Guardians of Chávez! I send you all my love! I keep recovering! I will live! Overcome!
Greetings to Lara, to her heroic People, to her producers and producers, to her next Governor !! Live Lara! Live the Revolution! Live! We will win!
Oh my Carib City! How happy they are with these truly Socialist achievements! Hugs Jackelin, Aristobulus and everyone! I will be back!
To those beautiful children of the Children's Brigades, may God bless me! Keep giving that wonderful example of PatriaSocialista!
@MargeeEnsign. ..was my pleasure too,seeing you & good meeting!
@ChikaNwobi. It was my pleasure...thanks!
@Laura_Ch As Central Americans we can do what we can do with pleasure, we are ready for you and the people of Costa Rica.
I am the guest of "12-13 Dimanche" on France 3, which begins in a few moments. # FH2012
There are sometimes incidents of campaign, I had myself received flour ... # France3 # FH2012
I think the campaign has to be held with the right height. # France3 # FH2012
I will not say anything that could appear as an overbid, like a verbal inflation. # France3 # FH2012
I presented my 60 commitments, I showed everything, I now have to demonstrate. # France3 # FH2012
I think that the French want to have genuine and sincere leaders. # France3 # FH2012
The artists and the sportsmen can spread over several years the taxation of their exceptional incomes. # France3 # FH2012
Everyone must make an effort. If there is a sacrifice to make, it is better to ask those who have more. # France3 # FH2012
That the leaders of the Football do a little cleaning! # France3 # FH2012
I learned that the sports director of PSG earned 6 million euros per year! # France3 # FH2012
Syrian regime must stop killings of their own people. President Al-Assad must step down. Allow unhindered access of humanitarian assistance.
I am not going to look for any other candidate, I address the French as a whole. # France3 # FH2012
We will mobilize together and I need the participation of everyone. # France3 # FH2012
We must overhaul the system and make a tax reform of magnitude! # France3 # FH2012
Income from capital will be taxed at the same level as labor income. # France3 # FH2012
RT @jonasgahrstore: Norway condemns violence, killing and assault in Syria, theme every day during my trip last week. Help must enter. UN security ...
On March 31, 2012, it will be a year since I am a candidate for the presidential election. # France3 # FH2012
I try to tell the French that it's better for them to be up to their problems. # France3 # FH2012
I move at my pace, my pace, without turning away from the issue. # France3 # FH2012
IF I am President, I wish to bring together the French to collectively restore us to justice and the preparation of the future.
I do not know if the information in the German press is accurate but it does not impress me. # France3 # FH2012
It is the French people who will decide their future, they are not European leaders. # France3 # FH2012
We are a great nation that is not dictated by leaders of other countries. # France3 # FH2012
I never allowed myself to say anything about the companions of the other candidates. It is a principle of elegance. # France3 # FH2012
I will be very attentive to the conditions of the poll in Russia. # France3 # FH2012
I am not in favor of a referendum on the European Treaty. I am for a renegotiation. # France3 # FH2012
We must have guarantees on the locations of the activities of the Peugeot group. # France3 # FH2012
I announced a proposal for a law: if Mr. Mittal does not want to keep his business at #Florange, there will be a buyer. # France3 # FH2012
I focused all my campaign on youth, from early childhood to entry into the workforce. # France3 # FH2012
I want none of our children to be without a solution. # France3 # FH2012
In companies, there will be an assessment of equality to fight against discrimination. # France3 # FH2012
I want to say to all the French population that youth is the condition of our own success. # France3 # FH2012
With regard to the nuclear issue: dismantle the nuclear facility in Qom, stop the enrichment of uranium, and to remove all material enriched in more than three and a half percent from the state.

Freedom and justice seeks, in cooperation with all political forces, to rebuild the institutions of the modern constitutional state to achieve the hopes and aspirations of Egyptian society.
